translations: v.降低；减少；将……归纳；折合（reduce 的第三人称单数形式）

sentences.sentence: Congestion frequently reduces traffic to walking pace.
sentences.translation: 交通阻塞经常把车流的速度降低得如步行一般缓慢。

sentences.sentence: The salt reduces the electrical resistance of the water.
The design of the bicycle reduces the effects of wind resistance and drag.
sentences.translation: 这种自行车的设计减少了风阻及曳力的影响。
